title: Cary Grant - His Girl Friday (1940
description:
His Girl Friday

Year:- 1940

Director:- Howard Hawkes

Run Time 1hr 28mins




Plot:

Walter Burns, editor of a major Chicago newspaper, is about to lose his ace reporter and former wife, Hildy Johnson, to insurance salesman Bruce Baldwin, but not without a fight!
The crafty editor uses every trick in his fedora to get Hildy to write one last big story, about murderer Earl Williams and the inept Sheriff Hartwell.
The comedy snowballs as William&#039;s friend, Molly Malloy, the crooked Mayor, and Bruce&#039;s mother all get tied up in Walter&#039;s web.


IMDB User Rating: 8.1/10 <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0032599" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0032599</a>
